problem.markdown: Which of the following is correct for the analysis of an open system? [x][mathjaxinline] \frac{dM_{cv}}{dt} = \frac{dm_{in}}{dt} - \frac{dm_{out}}{dt}[/mathjaxinline] [ ] [mathjaxinline]\frac{dM_{cv}}{dt} = -\frac{dm_{in}}{dt} + \frac{dm_{out}}{dt}[/mathjaxinline] [ ] [mathjaxinline] \frac{dM_{cv}}{dt} = 0[/mathjaxinline], since mass of control volume cannot change. [ ] None of the above.
problem.p: Which of the following is correct for the analysis of an open system?

checkboxgroup.choice: [mathjaxinline] \frac{dM_{cv}}{dt} = 0[/mathjaxinline], since mass of control volume cannot change.
